Author: henning
Content:
He always seem so sad and wistful. He always seems to be lamenting things.

But, he's still so influential that he can't be ignored.

Author: jgrahamc
Content:
No one else took you up on this, but my mother is definitely curvy.

John.

OK, now I know why no one else replied. I feel weird about talking about my mother that way.

Author: te_platt
Content: Or maybe smart men marry curvy women.  At least that's what I did.

Author: cellis
Content: Greed, for lack of a better word, is good. Greed is right. Greed works. Greed clarifies, cuts through, and captures the essence of the evolutionary spirit.

Author: Goladus
Content: The YouTube video has been taken down.  What was it about?

Author: falsestprophet
Content:
No. I am too young to know any McKinsey consultants personally. (As a rule they hold MBAs and I am only an undergraduate.) Although, many of my friends from back home seem to be eying the prize.

I am peripherally familiar because my father has done business with them and has told me a little about it. I do not know enough to evaluate the quality of their work (that hardly matters anyway). I can only speak to the ridiculous magnitude of their compensation.

You can read a little more about their compensation at\nhttp://www.careers-in-business.com/consulting/mcsal.htm and\nhttp://fisher.osu.edu/fin/opler/salary.htm .

I suspect Paul Graham could reliably earn several million dollars a year. But, I am sure, Y Combinator is more fun.

Content: Oh no, please don't let Hacker News turn into Ron Paul News... I mean Reddit.

Author: tlrobinson
Content:
It writes fine, and erases pretty well. It does leave a faint "ghosting", but an occasional wipe with some whiteboard cleaner makes it go away.

It's hard to complain for $13. I mean, we covered a whole wall for about $40.
